name: SPDR Gold Shares
description: SPDR Gold Shares (GLD) is an exchange-traded fund that aims to track the price of gold bullion, providing investors with a straightforward way to gain exposure to gold as an asset class. Launched in 2004 by State Street Global Advisors, GLD has become one of the largest and most liquid gold ETFs in the world. The fund holds physical gold bars stored in secure vaults, which allows investors to buy and sell shares that represent ownership in these gold holdings. This structure helps investors avoid the complexities of owning physical gold directly while still benefiting from price movements in the gold market. GLD is widely used by institutional and retail investors alike as a hedge against inflation and economic uncertainty, making it a popular choice during times of market volatility. The fund is designed to provide a cost-effective and transparent means for investors to access the performance of gold, which is often viewed as a safe-haven asset. With a strong track record and continuous growth, GLD has solidified its position as a key player in the commodities investment landscape.
